hero.title: 1960s-70s Modernism
hero.subtitle: A Tampere café channeling 1960s-70s modernism and Bauhaus functionalism. Welcome for coffee or wine, brulee or kekkeruusi, sandwich or traditional pöperö with a new wave take.
hero.english: A Tampere café channeling 1960s-70s modernism and Bauhaus functionalism. Welcome for coffee or wine, brulee or kekkeruusi, sandwich or traditional pöperö with a new wave take.

about.title: MODERNISM & FUNCTIONALISM
about.description: Cafe Noosi embodies the clean lines and functional beauty of 1960s-70s modernism, drawing inspiration from Bauhaus principles of form following function.

food.title: FOOD & DRINKS
food.subtitle: TRADITIONAL WITH A MODERN TWIST
food.description: Experience the perfect blend of traditional Finnish flavors with contemporary presentation. From freshly baked bread to delicate crème desserts, each dish reflects our commitment to quality and design.
